````shell
    Domain Trails - domains footprints, reconnaissance & information gathering

````

`âš ï¸This tool is for educational propuse only. Don't use it to abuse the online services & servers. `

Starting a simple project around information gathering related to domain / url / web addresses. This project is intended
for educational means, so what is in this project right now ...

## âœ¨ Highlights

![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3670A0?style=for-the-badge&logo=python&logoColor=ffdd54)
![PyCharm](https://img.shields.io/badge/pycharm-143?style=for-the-badge&logo=pycharm&logoColor=black&color=black&labelColor=green)

### Work completed

Following services are supported

- â˜‘ï¸ Domain Availability Check
- ðŸ“œ Domain Hosting History (based on dns)
- ðŸ“‡ï¸Domain DNS Information

### Work in progress

- ðŸ”„ Whois information (include history)
- ðŸ”„ Web Technologies
- ðŸ”„ Information over internet
